properties.SQL select query: UPDATE state_tracking SET state = '${new_state}' WHERE table_name = '${table_name}';

properties.log-message: The state of write_date colum in table ${table_name} is updated sucessfully.

properties.SQL select query: SELECT state FROM source_state_tracking WHERE table_name = '${table_name}';
SELECT MAX(write_date) as new_max_value FROM ${base_source_table} WHERE write_date > '${current_max_value}';
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(state), '1900-01-01'::TIMESTAMP) as max_value FROM staging_state_tracking WHERE table_name = '${table_name}';
